name: Realvation
tag_list: real-estate, network, consumer-network, neighborhood-open-house-events, open-house, real-estate-transaction, homes, properties, sell-house, buy-house, future, future-of-real-estate, democratization-of-real-estate, real-estate-trends, buyers, renters, land
overview:
Realvation is a Web technology and consumer real estate company which provides a simpler and more cost effective way to conduct real estate. What’s more, it represents an entirely new way buy, sell, rent, or least properties.

The Realvation online consumer real estate network solves two of the biggest problems in real estate by conveniently connecting buyers with sellers and renters with landlords and giving everyday people the ability to easily manage and complete a property transaction. Realvation transforms the industry by empowering individuals, and marks a sea change to the democratization of real estate.

Bringing People Together and Keeping Real Estate in Motion

Realvation neighborhood open house events â€“ in every neighborhood, every week - solves one of the biggest challenges in real estate, the problem of conveniently connecting buyers with sellers, and renters with landlords. Regularly scheduled Realvationâ„¢ neighborhood open house events keep real estate in motion.

Smart, Integrated Tools Enable Everyday People to Conduct a Real Estate Transaction

The Realvation network brings together innovative partners who share our vision to empower everyday people. Realvation provides users with smart tools at their fingertips to help conduct and complete a transaction
